page.title: 14Businesses in Bodenham
page.content: Allstone Memorials Ltd.The Head Office of this business is in Bodenham and all the administration - quotations, orders, and general paper work is done there. The works are in Bristol. The products include memorial stones, art work and signs. Bodenham Sand and Gravel pits. Owned by Redlands. 15 people work on the premises; the manager is Mr Davis. On the site there are work shops and offices. They produce ready-mixed concrete, sand and gravel.The gravel pits are coming to the end of their active life and a new boating club has taken over the lakes of water that have filled the pits. Mr C W Smith is an agricultural contractor and engineer and runs his business from his home - Hurst View. He employs 3 regular and a few casual workers. He sells farm machinery.
